properties.text: Estrategias para el cambio de comportamiento
Business Model Canvas by Alexander Osterwalder
Hacer usuarios adictos a tu App
Use Mindfulness to Avoid Acting on the Cue
Crowd Out Old Habit With New Behavior
Help User to Think About His/Her Actions
Target Outcome: What is the Product Supposed to Accomplish?
Target Actor: Who Will Use the Product?
Target Action: How Will the User do it?
Customer Experience Map by Mel Edwards
Business Model Inspirator by Orange Hills
In General: Keep It Short and Simple (KISS)
Make it Easy to Understand, Easy to Complete
Make Progress Meaningful in Order to Reward User
Cuando la atención es Fugaz y Escasa
Cuando tienes oportunidades de influenciar al usuario
Asegurarse que tus usuarios lo hacen facilmente
Tell User What the Action is and Ask For it
Make it Clear, Where to Act
Make the UI Professional and Beautiful
Lessen the Burden of Action and Information
Frame Text to Avoid Temporal Myopia
Remind of Prior Commitment to Act
